BoxInterface.name: root
BoxInterface.tooltip: Root box of Choregraphe's project. Highest level possible.

Input.name: onLoad
Input.tooltip: Signal sent when diagram is loaded.

Input.name: onStart
Input.tooltip: Box behavior starts when a signal is received on this input.

Input.name: onStop
Input.tooltip: Box behavior stops when a signal is received on this input.

Output.name: onStopped
Output.tooltip: Signal sent when box behavior is finished.

Parameter.name: Speed (%)
Parameter.tooltip: Changes the speed of the voice.

Parameter.name: Min value
Parameter.tooltip: The minimum value you can get.

Parameter.name: Language
Parameter.tooltip: Set the language NAO speaks and understands.

Parameter.name: File path
Parameter.tooltip: Path of the file (including its name) which is going to be sent on the box output.
